metadata.title: CVE-2023-4511 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: BT SDP dissector infinite loop in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.7 and 3.6.0 to3.6.15 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capturefile

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
